googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jerry Ellis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very professional, fast, honest, friendly.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Thank you Jerry! 
Kind words are always accepted here :)
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Robert Hammer
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Absolutely the best and most professional plumber.  He worked us in right away.  Quick, efficient and friendly.  Thanks Dan.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Krawezart
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Plumber Dan was great! He fixed two leaks in separate locations within an hour. Very professional and friendly. Would definitely use him for future projects!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Darryl Paul
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I suggest You do not hire this plumber he gave me a window to show up 8:00 to 12:00 and showed 3:00 I had a PVC leak at the shut-off valve He suggests changing the valve and repaired the PVC leak and I believe had a drip in a copper line I'm not sure what he had done with it and I had a drip in my shower valve he said he could replace it for 600 to 700 dollars he found it had a sticky plunger for the shower head and freed it up and the drip seem to stop the next morning I found it was Dripping like crazy I text him he said it needed to be replaced I removed the valve body took it to Lowe's and got a new one to replace it now it does not drip he charged me $555 dollars for his services and left I contacted him and asked for a itemized detailed invoice so I can see what he did and for how much for each repair he said that was a flat rate and they do not give detailed invoices very shady and unethical way to do business you have been warned don't hire this plumber
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
I’m sorry you think you had a bad experience but you were told upfront how much we were an hour and we were at your house for three hours using multiple parts, including a pressure reducing valve.  The leak in your crawlspace was on your incoming waterline not a copper waterline. It had leaked so much that Below your house was completely flooded. All the copper pipes were sweating Because of the water leak in the middle of July.
The PVC leak we repaired Looked like freeze damage from the winter before.
As for the price to replace a shower valve. That is a flat rate price. I’m glad you were able to repair it.
We just always recommend replacement of older valves that aren’t up to code. Faucets that aren’t scald proof like yours. 
Thank you. 
Have a great day!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Fred Guthrie
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Dan came out after hours on the same day we contacted him to help us out. He was quick and it was obvious he knew what he was doing. The issue was resolved in under an hour and we couldn't be happier. We'll be calling him again for future plumbing projects/needs.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Brian Henry
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I found Dan to be very easy guy to work with. He replaced my faulty shutoff valve which was leaking under the house. He did a pro job and didn’t make a mess.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: mtprtr por
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Dan arrived on time and did a great job.  Very friendly as well!
Highly recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: David Mc.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Dan was very easy to deal with! Showed up on time, did the work, left everything in good shape and at a reasonable price. I don’t know what else you could ask for. And he’s a super nice guy! Highly recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Joe Rubino
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Dan went out of his way to take care of my issue. I had two toilets dripping down on the ceiling on the floor below. He drove quite a distance to help.  I just moved to Alabama and my house is on a slab and doesn't have the best access points to just switch something out. So much you find out after the close of the house I guess.

Dan was able to assess the problem and tackled it. You're in good hands with Dan!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tyler Hughes
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: My go to for all my service and new construction plumbing.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Megan Pope
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Wonderful & friendly customer service - it was less than 3 hours from the time I called to request a technician to having our sink operational again! We definitely will be repeat customers for any plumbing needs we have in the future!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for your kind words.  It was a pleasure doing business with you.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: kathy martin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
PlumberDan is the BEST!
He immediately texted me back when I left a message and was at my house within 2 hours.  It’s difficult to find anyone in this area who returns calls and actually shows up! Especially when I’m only here part time. So happy he was my first call.  I won’t use anyone else!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Mrs Martin. It was a pleasure doing business with you.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Lorianne Lopez
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Started hearing horn sounds from the pipes that was getting louder and louder.  We were going to have company and needed this fixed asap. I Called Plumber Dan and they came out and fixed it on the same day, even worked in the rain to get the job done. Would highly recommend and I would call them again if I need future plumbing work.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Mrs Lopez. That was one heck of a storm! :) Thank you for your business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: T Neeley
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I called PlumberDan because we discovered a leaking pipe at our office after the freeze.  He was able to work us into an already busy schedule and quickly repair our problem to get us back up and running so that we could reopen.  All of his communications were prompt and professional.  I would call him again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Rusty Shackleford
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very knowledgeable and straightforward. Prompt and treats customers like they matter.. Highly recommend and will be my go to plumber from here on out
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: James Day
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Plumber Dan is awesome! We've used their services several times now for different issues.  They are courteous, fairly priced,  prompt,  and experts in their field.  They're my plumber of choice.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Paige Sims
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We use Plumber Dan for all of our plumbing needs. They are always professional and extremely nice. They offer great work at an extremely fair price. The work we have had done is second to none. You can’t go wrong with Plumber Dan!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Brittani Atwood
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very friendly, responsive, and knowledgeable. Most importantly, very honest. Plumber Dan’s attention to detail sets him apart from any other plumber we’ve used. There is no other plumber I would consider using. Highly recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: donna richmond
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: First trip: they came out and put putty around tub gasket and stated the leak was repaired. However, we now have ceiling water damage where the repair was clearly not fixed. Second trip: they found the faucet needs caulking BUT they do not caulk, really!!!! They cut a hole in the sheet rock but do not repair sheet rock, so we are responsible for that repair. They are also not responsible for the ceiling damage that would not be there if they had of originally fixed the leak!! I would stay clear of this irresponsible company!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
First of all.  You have a home warranty that doesn’t pay for secondary damage.  The tub drain was reset with new putty because it was leaking.  The home warranty also is the one responsible for the hole cut in the sheetrock not the plumbing company looking for the leak.  I don’t know any plumbing company that does sheet rock. Also if you read your contract it doesn’t pay for caulking because they can’t warranty a sealing product. Basic maintenance such as caulking is part of home ownership.
I’m sorry you had a bad experience, but none of your complaints have anything to do with anything in our control. Thank you
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Fancy
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I can't thank the PlumberDan crew, especially the gentleman that came and replaced out water heater. He was polite, professional, and attentive to our issue. PlumberDan is the way to go when you have plumbing need. 10stars from us!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tiffany Watson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Plumber Dan was very thorough when searching for our leaks. He made sure to explain the repairs and cost before anything was done. The fix date was set promptly. We were pleased that he worked in a timely manner. All leaks are repaired and no problems since. We have recommended Plumber Dan to many people and will continue to do so!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kayla Strength
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Plumber Dan was easy to work with and was very professional. He diagnosed our issue and had it resolved quickly. We will definitely be calling PD for any future needs!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Plumber Dan Services LLC

## Business Information

However, specific details about Plumber Dan Services LLC's licenses are not available in the provided sources. It is likely that they have obtained the necessary licenses from DeKalb County, given their physical location[1].

- **Physical Location and Service Areas**:
  - The physical location of Plumber Dan Services LLC is 1211 Jennings Rd SE, Fort Payne, AL 35967. The service area is likely to include Fort Payne and surrounding areas in DeKalb County, although the exact service areas are not specified in the sources[2].

- **Hours and Payment Methods**:
  - The specific hours of operation and payment methods for Plumber Dan Services LLC are not provided in the available sources.

- **Years in Operation**:

## Services & Specialties

- **Types of Services Offered**:

## Customer Reviews & Reputation

However, for accurate reviews, one would need to refer to the actual review platform where the 4.5-star rating (based on 25 reviews) is listed.

- **BBB Rating and Status**:

- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**:
  - Generally, positive themes for plumbing services include promptness, professionalism, and quality of work. However, specific themes for Plumber Dan Services LLC are not available in the provided sources.

- **Response to Reviews**:
  - There is no information available on how Plumber Dan Services LLC responds to customer reviews.

## Owner & Staff

- **Owner/Management Information**:
  - The owner or management details for Plumber Dan Services LLC are not explicitly mentioned in the provided sources. The business is identified as "Plumber Dan," suggesting that the owner or primary operator may be someone named Dan, but this is not confirmed.

- **Staff Qualifications**:

- **Professional Certifications**:
  - The sources do not provide any information on professional certifications held by the owner or staff of Plumber Dan Services LLC. However, plumbers in Alabama are typically required to be licensed by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board[2][4].
aboutUs: At Plumber Dan Services LLC, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbing professionals dedicated to providing top-notch service to the residents of Fort Payne and surrounding areas in DeKalb County. Our expertise spans a wide range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to complex installations and system overhauls. With a strong local presence and a deep understanding of the region's plumbing needs, we are committed to delivering reliable and efficient solutions tailored to your specific requirements.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Unparalleled expertise and a commitment to delivering exceptional plumbing solutions for your home or business.
sellingPoints: Highly trained and certified technicians with extensive knowledge of the latest plumbing techniques and technologies.
Prompt and reliable service, with a focus on minimizing disruptions and ensuring your plumbing systems are functioning optimally.
Comprehensive range of services, from minor repairs to complete system installations, all backed by our commitment to quality workmanship.
